column1: The Pit Room////Let's start with the good: BEEF. RIBS. One rib is mostly likely one pound
column2: and one pound costs $22. BUT. This fatty
column5: was quite tasty if not a bit under-seasoned. Nothing some sauce can't fix
column6: but I was hoping I could enjoy the flavor of the meat itself a but more. Great smoky flavor
column7: best thing I had on the menu.
